mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PROJECT (CT_NO, PJ_NO, PJ_TITLE, PJ_PRICE, PJ_ST_DT, PJ_TERM, PJ_CATEGORY, PJ_DEADLINE, PJ_PLAN, PJ_SKILLS, PJ_MEETING, PJ_LOC, PJ_SUBLOC, PJ_CONTENT )
VALUES (client_seq.nextval, PROJECT_SEQ.nextval, #{pjTitle}, #{pjPrice}, #{pjSt_dt}, #{pjTerm}, #{pjCategory}, #{pjDeadline}, #{pjPlan}, #{pjSkills}, #{pjMeeting}, #{pjLoc}, #{pjSubloc},#{pjContent} )
